Calculation - Bug BCG

CLASSES: MN Bug BCG models were calibrated for nine classes.

Index_Name Index_Class Description
MN_BCG bug1 Minnesota bug 1 (n forest rivers)
MN_BCG bug2 Minnesota bug 2 (prairie rivers)
MN_BCG bug3 Minnesota bug 3 (n riffle run - forest)
MN_BCG bug4 Minnesota bug 4 (n forest glide-pool)
MN_BCG bug5 Minnesota bug 5 (s riffle-run)
MN_BCG bug6 Minnesota bug 6 (s forest glide-pool)
MN_BCG bug7 Minnesota bug 7 (prairie glide-pool)
MN_BCG bug8 Minnesota bug 8 (n coldwater)
MN_BCG bug9 Minnesota bug 9 (s coldwater)
